SEARCH
Package com.app.game.service

Interface GameService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameServiceImpl
public interface GameService
Service interface for game-related operations.

This interface defines methods for generating quests and checking player answers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    checkAnswers(AnswersDto answersDto)
    Checks the player's answers against the correct answers for the quests.
    List<QuestDto>
    generateQuests()
    Generates a list of quests for the game.

  • Method Details

    • generateQuests

      List<QuestDto> generateQuests()
      Generates a list of quests for the game.
      Returns:
      a list of QuestDto representing the generated quests

    • checkAnswers

      Player checkAnswers(AnswersDto answersDto)
      Checks the player's answers against the correct answers for the quests.
      Parameters:
      answersDto - the AnswersDto containing the player's answers
      Returns:
      the Player object after updating their statistics based on the answers
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided answersDto is null or if the player ID in answersDto does not exist
